history.proof: intros x n. induction n. - simpl. rewrite mult_one_r. rewrite mult_one_l. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite <- IHn. rewrite mult_assoc. sfirstorder depth: 3use: pow_n_plus.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of pow_n_plus (pow_n _ (_ + _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of pow_n_plus (pow_n _ (_ + _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment K : Ring x : K n : nat IHn : mult (pow_n x n) x = mult x (pow_n x n) Unable to unify "mult (mult x (pow_n x n)) x" with "mult (mult (pow_n x n) x) x".

original: intros x n. induction n. - simpl. rewrite mult_one_r. rewrite mult_one_l. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite pow_n_plus. rewrite <- IHn. rewrite pow_n_plus. rewrite mult_assoc. reflexivity.
